name: Gunbelievable
description:
Gunbelievable was developed over the course of 4 days for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT game jam! Gunbelievable is a twin-stick shooter featuring destructible/buildable terrain, created using the Godot Engine.

Best played with a twin-stick controller 😀

Music is "Electronic music track X1" and "electronic pop-synth pop" by Frankum.

#stopwaitingforgodot
